title: RedFin Scraper
description: Scrapes real-estate on RedFin for a particular location

location.title: Search
location.description: Location for the real-estate that we are interested in scraping e.g. city, school, address or ZipCode.

maxItems.title: Maximum search results
maxItems.description: Limit the number of properties to be scraped. Set as 0 to scrape all of the properties in the location.

proxyConfig.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfig.description: This is required if you want to use Apify Proxy.
